title: MANDELA-Long Walk to Freedom _2013.DVDSCR.x264.AC3 (with Gr Subs
description:
Genre: Biography | Drama | History

Production Country: UK | South Africa

Language: English | Afrikaans

Subtitles: Greek (srt)

Duration: 2h 26mn

Directed by: Justin Chadwick

Screenplay: William Nicholson (screenplay), Nelson Mandela

Cast: Idris Elba, Naomie Harris, Terry Pheto


Biography of Nelson Mandela from the years of his youth in a provincial village in South Africa, to those of the Multi prison for his ideas of the apartheid regime, as his election as the first president of the first democratically elected government.
